item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United, Liverpool tracking Watford winger Maamma
item.description: Manchester United and Liverpool have been tracking Watford winger Othmane Maamma. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Smith sets Big Ten's assist record, eyes D1 mark
item.description: No. 5 Purdue guard Braden Smith became the Big Ten's career assists leader, passing Cassius Winston, in an 89-73 win over Wisconsin
